-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

TO USE THE JAR
YOU HAVE TO PRESS left AND right KEYS ON YOUR KEYBOARD TO CHANGE THE times NUMBER
YOU HAVE TO PRESS up AND down TO CHANGE THE mod

IF YOU WANT IT TO MOVE AUTOMATICALY YOU HAVE WRITE auto WHILE RUNNING THE FILE

TO RUN
java -jar build.jar

FOR AUTOMATIC
java -jar build.jar auto






-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
